tool_description: Unleash the power of Dark Souls in your applications! With a comprehensive collection of Dark Souls data, including weapons, armor, items, and enemies, Souls API provides developers with detailed insights, extensive statistics, scaling attributes, special effects, and immersive lore. Whether you're building a companion app, fan website, or gaming tool, Souls API is your go-to resource to create captivating experiences for Dark Souls enthusiasts. Join us and harness the power of the Dark Soul...
title: Souls API
